TEI.2.document_title: James F Perry to Isreal McGready, 07-12-1832

barker_notes.barker_summary: James F. Perry to Isreal McGready, July 12, 1832. Personal business in Missouri. Recent disturbances in Texas. Laws administered as well as in Missouri in territorial days. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 817
